name: NumberFormatter.PadPosition
desc: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be padded. These constants are used by the paddingPosition property.

items.name: case beforePrefix
items.desc: Specifies that the padding should occur before the prefix.

items.name: case afterPrefix
items.desc: Specifies that the padding should occur after the prefix.

items.name: case beforeSuffix
items.desc: Specifies that the padding should occur before the suffix.

items.name: case afterSuffix
items.desc: Specifies that the padding should occur after the suffix.
